name: EtherOrcs
introduce: EtherOrcs is a 100% on-chain game and eco-system. Orcs and their Allies go on raids, pillages, journeys, and more. Each collection within the EtherOrcs world has a unique utility that gives it access to in game tokens that drive most actions and rewards. Through interactive and strategic gameplay, players earn better gear, more NFTs, and compete in an immersive eco-system built on the bedrock of the Ethereum blockchain.
